column6: Way too bright for a plum color

column14: I love the Infallible Le Rouge lipstick line, but this color was just too much for me personally.  It is a cross between bright red and deep fuschia, it seems.  I have medium toned olive skin and hair is salt and pepper.

column14: Love this lipstick, the color -- the product is moist when applied. Quality product and good value.

column14: Would give it a zero star, if possible. It arrived on time. However, when I opened the lipstick tube, it was smeared all around top and when twisted up, it was just coming apart. I tried to straighten, but when you put it on your lips it just came apart.

column14: I love this lipstick, this is the second one I have bought, in fact, ordered two of same color.  Stays on very well. Very pleased!

column14: I was looking for a red shade. Very happy with the purchase. Nice coverage and the color suits my dark skin and lips. Not bright or dull. Just the right color I was looking.
